items.title: KPCC for iPad
items.teaser: Product design for KPCC's flagship native tablet app.
items.description: The flagship iPad app for KPCC, public radio for Southern California. KPCC for iPad positions KPCC as a digital news leader in Los Angeles, and connects our audiences to the public radio they love.

challenges.item: Build audience recognition that KPCC is more than just radio
Design an experience that creates addictive reading habits
Make a great listening experience for the public radio our audiences love
Deepen the emotional connection with our brand to build increased loyalty/membership

outcomes.item: Created a new editorial feature, The Short List, delivering curated editions of the day's news to iPad users in the early morning and late afternoon
Leveraged iPad's canvas to feature edge-to-edge editorial photography

Optimized listening experience for public radio fans: users can select their favorite programs, have new episodes automatically added to a queue, and the design across the app is optimized for audio discovery
